Package <Unnamed>

Class Summary
BluetoothConnection  
CaptureTheFlag Creates all the different objects and starts the localization and the search.
LCDInfo  
LightLocalizer Handles the light localization by clocking the gridlines.
Navigation Handles the displacements of the robot, allowing it to go forward, backward and to travel to specified coordinates.
ObjectDetector Takes care of recognizing what the object in range is using a color sensor and sets a signal for search to respond in consequence.
Odometer Allows to track the position of the robot at all time, the x position, the y position and the angle.
ParseTransmission  
Search Takes care of searching for the flag once we are in the opponent's zone and capturing once it is found.
Transmission  
TwoLightsLocalizer Class used to do the light localization using 2 light sensors placed at a fixed distance from the axle track (3.7 cm).
TwoWheeledRobot Allows the robot to be referred to as a single entity as opposed to sending messages to the 2 wheel motors.
USLocalizer Handles the ultrasonic localization using Falling Edge detection.
USPoller Takes care of the ultrasonic pings for every class that requires it.
 

Enum Summary
ObjectDetector.ObjectType  
PlayerRole  
StartCorner  
TwoLightsLocalizer.Sensor
